  • Method Details

    • configureAnalyzer

      protected void configureAnalyzer()
      Configure this analyzer
      • PREFERRED_VIEW list of views to try and get data from, default TEXT
      • ANALYZED_DATA_NAME name of view to store results in or 'base' for primary data, default null

    • getPreferredData

      protected byte[] getPreferredData(IBaseDataObject payload)
      Search for the first preferred view that is present or use the primary data if none
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload to pull data from

    • setPreferredData

      protected boolean setPreferredData(IBaseDataObject payload, byte[] analyzedData)
      Set the results back into the preferred data location
      Parameters:
      payload - the data object to load
      analyzedData - the results of the analysis
      Returns:
      true if the data was stored, false if not. See ANALYZED_DATA_NAME config element
